member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Framework.Controllers.Generated.ASpaceThreadsController.AptifyGeneratedEntryMethod_SpaceThreads_Default(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves SpaceThread information by the SpaceID. Additional filtering can be performed with query parameters, even if the space id is unknown or if all space ids are wanted.
member.param: The explicit Space Thread wanted. Do not send this parameter if you want to get all information for a users feed.
